snippet.title: Johnny Depp Triumph - Won his lawsuit against ex-wife Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp won the case in which he asked his ex-wife Amber Heard to prove that the money from his divorce was donated to a foundation.

“Johnny Depp's Glory!
Johnny Deep has triumphed in this long legal battle we've known for a long time against his ex-wife, Amber Heard, after the British newspaper The Sun called Depp the 'wife beating', "United for Johnny Depp reported..


In a Twitter thread, he noted that a New York judge granted Heard's request to find out if he donated the $ 7 million settled in his 2016 divorce to the American Civil Liberties Union and Children's Hospital of Los Angeles.

By the judge's decision, he must release documents confirming whether Amber Heard, who has become a controversy among the actors, has taken this action.

Depp's lawyer, Benjamin Chew, said in a statement that he was very pleased with the court's decision.

The actor admitted he was “dishonest” in his donations to the Children's Hospital and assured him that he would recoup the payment.
